nixpacks.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y locales && sed -i -e 's/# ru_RU.UTF-8 UTF-8/ru_RU.UTF-8 UTF-8/' /etc/locale.gen && dpkg-reconfigure --frontend=noninteractive locales
nixpacks.startCommand: export LANG=ru_RU.UTF-8 && export LC_ALL=ru_RU.UTF-8 && gunicorn calendar_app.wsgi --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT
